MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH52 postcode area of Bathgate. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.59pm. Our engineers have now arrived in the local area and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:15PM on Sunday, 01 November 2020.
